name: Ogooluwani Adewale
tagline: Inventing tomorrow's web, one line of code at a time.
about:
üëã Hey there! I‚Äôm Ogooluwani Adewale, an IT professional with over five years of experience in software development. My work goes beyond writing code. For me, it is about telling a story with design and ensuring every user walks away with a smooth and memorable experience.

 üíª I work with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Dart and Python, alongside frameworks like React, Angular, Vue and Flutter. I also use Framer, WordPress and Shopify to help brands and businesses create modern websites, sleek portfolios and powerful e-commerce solutions that stand out.

 üöÄ I thrive where creativity meets technology. Every project is a chance to transform ideas into digital products that are not only functional but also beautiful and impactful. I enjoy blending design with performance and innovation with usability.

 üé® Beyond code, I am passionate about continuous learning and growth. I love exploring new technologies, experimenting with tools that push boundaries and finding fresh ways to improve the user experience.

education.title: B.Sc Economics
education.description: Completed a rigorous four-year program in Economics with a focus on quantitative analysis, policy evaluation, and research. Actively engaged in leadership and student governance, blending academic excellence with organizational impact.
achievements: Strengthened student leadership culture by contributing to the Leadership Qualities & Entrepreneurial Development (LQED) Committee, helping organize programs that improved entrepreneurial awareness among peers.
Led the technical team of the Nigerian Economics Students‚Äô Association (NESA OAU), introducing digital tools that improved event coordination and boosted student engagement.
Oversaw a fair and transparent electoral process as Electoral Chairman of NESA OAU, successfully managing student elections with high participation and credibility.
